final_production_data.main_heading: Millions of New Solar System Objects Detected
headlines: Astronomers reveal new research showing detection of millions of objects
New facility expected to come online later this year
Stay tuned for more details on the discovery
final_production_data.tts_script: Astronomers have revealed new research showing that millions of new solar system objects are likely to be detected by a brand-new facility, which is expected to come online later this year.

original_raw_news.original_title: Millions of new solar system objects to be found and 'filmed in technicolor' -- studies predict
original_raw_news.original_summary: Astronomers have revealed new research showing that millions of new solar system objects are likely to be detected by a brand-new facility, which is expected to come online later this year.
